권리? 권리는 뜨고 나서 요구하는 거야. Rights? You only get Rights when you get famous. 듣기 View video 아이돌 드라마 공작단 (Idol Drama Operation Team) : [드라마 5화] 꿈에 그리던 옆집소녀 데뷔!

examples.korean: rights and freedoms guaranteed by the constitution 발음듣기 헌법이 보장하는 권리와 자유 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: rights and freedoms guaranteed by the constitution 발음

examples.korean: ‘You had no right!’ she said heatedly. 발음듣기 “당신에겐 권리가 없었어!” 그녀가 열을 내며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘You had no right!’ she said heatedly. 발음

examples.korean: He had no right to meddle in her affairs. 발음듣기 그가 그녀 일에 간섭할 권리는 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had no right to meddle in her affairs. 발음

examples.korean: the inalienable right to decide your own future 발음듣기 스스로의 미래를 결정할, 빼앗을 수 없는 권리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the inalienable right to decide your own future 발음

examples.korean: He has forfeited his right to be taken seriously. 발음듣기 그는 진지하게 받아들여질 권리를 박탈당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has forfeited his right to be taken seriously. 발음
